briefTitle: Hybrid Simulation in Teaching Clinical Breast Examination
officialTitle: The Use of Hybrid Simulation (HS) of the Breast in Teaching Clinical Breast Examination (CBE) to Medical Students.
conditions: Medical Education, Clinical Breast Examination, Medical Simulation, Standardized Patient
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Third year medical students (Med III) at the American University of Beirut
* Rotating in the Obstetrics and Gynecology department at the American University of Beirut Medical Center

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
